name: The Warbanner of Clan Guzan
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution like a god.
It has nice armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users psionic resistance strongly.
This item loses its magical powers very fast.
'Confront thy enemy with the gaze of a male lion,
Command thy soldiers with a gloved fist of iron,
Wave thy banner, for Glory awaits!'
